summary: A PySide2‑based toolkit that supplies reusable Qt widgets, validators, and dialogs for constructing the graphical wizards used to configure, schedule, and restart tumbler (coin‑mixing) runs. It includes amount editors with BTC/satoshi validation, various button types, password prompts, QR‑code pop‑ups, BIP78 payment dialogs, and dynamic schedule pages, all aimed at providing a consistent user interface for the tumbler application.
business_intent: Enable end‑users to safely and conveniently set up, manage, and monitor cryptocurrency mixing operations through an intuitive graphical interface that validates inputs, presents payment details, and guides them through scheduling and restarting tumbles.
